p: This programme was started in 2004 by the MoHFW, Government of India, to strengthen the disease surveillance systems for epidemics/outbreak detection and response. It maintains a rapid response team across several locations of the country and aims to strengthen laboratory systems for early detection and diagnosis of epidemics/outbreaks. It uses a network of IT-enabled systems for quick collection, analysis, reporting on samples and dissemination of results. Policy guidance is, thus, provided to respective local, regional or national health departments 12.
